Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஆற்றாரும் ஆற்றி அடுப இடனறிந்து போற்றார்கண் போற்றிச் செயின்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Even the powerless will become powerful and conquer, if they select a proper field (of action), and guard themselves, while they make war on their enemies.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A small, seemingly weak group of rebels ('ஆற்றார்') are positioned at a narrow, easily defensible mountain pass ('இடனறிந்து').
Layered_Composition.Midground: A massive, powerful army ('போற்றார்') is trying to attack them but is forced to enter the narrow pass only a few soldiers at a time, neutralizing their numerical advantage.
Layered_Composition.Background: The small rebel group, using their strategic position, is shown to be successfully defeating the much larger army, becoming powerful and victorious ('ஆற்றி அடுப') through their knowledge of the place.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Even the weak can become strong and defeat a powerful enemy if they choose the right place to fight and defend themselves well.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The narrow pass is the classic example of a strategic location that nullifies superior numbers. The contrast in the size of the two armies is crucial to show the power of place.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Strategic, underdog victory, intelligent warfare, powerful.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The rebels in the pass are in a defensible shadow, while the attacking army is exposed in the bright, harsh sunlight. The colors are gritty and realistic.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A high-angle shot from behind the rebels, showing their strategic advantage and the bottleneck they have created for the enemy army.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, cinematic, epic battle scene reminiscent of the Battle of Thermopylae.

Cultural_Anchors: Strategic defense against a superior foe.

Negative_Prompt: rebels fighting in an open field, rebels losing, text artifacts, cartoonish.
